text:
People Have Found Peter Dinklage AKA Tyrion Lannister’s Look Alike In Pakistan & The Resemblance Is Striking
People Have Found Peter Dinklage AKA Tyrion Lannister’s Look Alike In Pakistan & The Resemblance Is Striking
“I am the god of tits and wine!” – when Peter Dinklage AKA Tyrion Lannister had said this line on Game of Thrones, he proved he was the king of sass. You’re probably living on some other planet, if you don’t like Tyrion Lannister. I mean, he's witty, he is powerful, he is never afraid to say the truth and he always has a great piece of advice.
via GIPHY
But we are not here to give you a brief on how awesome that character on Game of Thrones is. We want to introduce you to his doppelganger. Remember Imtiaz Ali had found Peter Dinklage’s look-alike in Kashmir? Now, another one has been spotted in Peshawar, Pakistan.
Also Read: Meet Tariq Mir, India's Very Own Tyrion Lannister, Who Was Spotted By Imitaz Ali In Kashmir
The man has reportedly been identified as Roza Khan. The resemblance is uncanny, right?
Wajahat Rauf, who is a director and producer from Pakistan also shared the picture. And he asked Peter Dinklage to acknowledge him too. Take a look!
Tyrion Lannister in Pakistan! @Peter_Dinklage Please say to him. His name is Roza Khan pic.twitter.com/KphpBrVo6Q — Wajahat Rauf (@wajahatrauf) February 12, 2019
Here’s how fans reacted!
found Tyrion Lannister in Peshawar, Pakistan pic.twitter.com/dr5Y7QDisn — Farrukh (@AbyyLay) February 12, 2019
Don't Miss 837 SHARES 2.4 K SHARES 763 SHARES 2.1 K SHARES 1.3 K SHARES
Ghareebon ka Tyrion Lannister — Ishfaq (@ItsIshfaq) February 12, 2019
You vs the guy she told you not to worry about.#peterdinklage pic.twitter.com/RjMmkYU22i — Pat_Han (@Pengestani) February 12, 2019
Hr cheez ki copy hai humare pass — Erish 🍁 (@erishsays) February 12, 2019
Hahaha meri khwahish hai isse milna — Imama (@imamayourmama) February 12, 2019
He is the spitting image of tyrion, amazing — Muhammad Sohail (@Sohailzzz) February 13, 2019
He was falsely accused of murdering his nephew, King Joffrey, so he ran to peshawar. 😂 Season 8 — Danish (@fictionalshad0w) February 12, 2019
Tyrion lannister escaped from kings landing and found in Rawalpindi 🔥 pic.twitter.com/jW5t9R4pOC — Gujjar Scaram (@gujjar_scaram22) February 13, 2019
Wow 😮 almost same — IMRAN JANJUA. (@imranjanjua338) February 12, 2019
title: People Have Found Peter Dinklage AKA Tyrion Lannister’s Look Alike In Pakistan & The Resemblance Is Striking
